pages.title: Chromatic Iron
pages.text: Chromatic Iron is a fairly rare ore that spawns in big veins, but it is rarely exposed to air. $(br2)When mined, it drops $(l)Raw Chromatic Iron$(). $(br)The amount of Raw Chromatic Iron dropped per ore is affected by fortune.
When smelted, Raw Chromatic Iron turns into $(l)Chromatic Iron Ingot$(). $(br2)Chromatic Iron Ingot is commonly used in modded recipes.
